code: import React from'react';import'./StatCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatCard=_ref=>{let{title,value,label,icon,color='#007bff',trend=null,chartComponent=null}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card-title",children:[icon&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"stat-card-icon",style:{color},children:icon}),title]}),trend&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-trend ".concat(trend.type),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"trend-arrow",children:trend.type==='up'?'↗':trend.type==='down'?'↘':'→'}),trend.value]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-card-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-value",style:{color},children:value}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-label",children:label})]}),chartComponent&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-card-chart",children:chartComponent})]});};export default StatCard;
